title: "Artificial Intelligence Requires New Data Center Infrastructure"
excerpt: "The data center infrastructure build-out in recent years to support the explosion of cloud computing, video streaming and 5G networks will not be sufficient to support the next-level digital transformation that has begun in earnest with the widespread adoption of artificial intelligence."
